ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A Bard's Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: well, to be honest yes we are a class to fill-in when others can not, mostly an enchanter and and to a lesser degree a shaman.  if the group relies on the bard
ygData.messageBody:
well, to be honest yes we are a class to fill-in when others can not, mostly
an enchanter and and to a lesser degree a shaman. if the group relies on
the bard though, we come through for them in all regards. i have no trouble
finding groups because of my guild and my friends, but i can see how it may
be difficult for a lone bard to find a place in groups that do not know what
we are capable of, and insist on those that all too often get picked above
us. stick with it though, we all know how important bards are =) and the
problems finding groups slowly disappear as you level past 50, where good
bards and enchanters are harder to find.

Shada Powa, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr


> But right now I worry that the benefits of a bard in the group are
> something that not too many others appreciate.
